fields.name: BackupManagementType
fields.description: Type of backup management for the container.

fields.name: ContainerType
fields.description:
Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2.
Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is
Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer. 5. Storage containers is StorageContainer. 6. Azure workload
Backup is VMAppContainer

fields.name: HealthStatus
fields.description: Status of health of the container.

fields.name: ProtectableObjectType
fields.description: Type of the protectable object associated with this container

fields.name: RegistrationStatus
fields.description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.
